storyTitle: As Payroll Specialist, I want to ensure timekeeping data is accurately integrated to achieve smooth payroll processing

functional.title: Verify successful configuration of timekeeping integration settings
preconditions: User is logged in as Payroll Specialist with timekeeping integration permissions
Timekeeping API endpoint is accessible and responding
Integration settings page is loaded and displayed
Valid API credentials are available for configuration

steps.action: Navigate to 'Timekeeping Integration' settings page from the main payroll dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Integration settings page loads successfully with configuration form displayed

steps.action: Enter valid API endpoint URL 'https://timekeeping.api.com/v1' in the 'API Endpoint' field
steps.expectedResult: API endpoint URL is accepted and displayed in the field without validation errors

steps.action: Enter valid API key in the 'API Key' field and select authentication method 'OAuth 2.0' from dropdown
steps.expectedResult: API credentials are masked appropriately and authentication method is selected

steps.action: Click 'Test Connection' button to verify API connectivity
steps.expectedResult: Success message 'Connection successful' appears in green banner with checkmark icon

steps.action: Click 'Save Configuration' button in the bottom-right corner
steps.expectedResult: Configuration is saved successfully with confirmation message 'Integration settings saved successfully' displayed

postconditions: Timekeeping integration settings are persisted in the database
Integration status shows as 'Active' on the settings page
System is ready to retrieve timekeeping data from configured API
Audit log entry is created for configuration change

functional.title: Verify automated retrieval of timekeeping data from API without errors
preconditions: Timekeeping integration is configured and active
User is logged in as Payroll Specialist
Timekeeping API contains valid time entries for current pay period
System is on the 'Timekeeping Data' page

steps.action: Navigate to 'Timekeeping Data' page from payroll dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Timekeeping Data page loads with 'Retrieve Data' button visible

steps.action: Select pay period '01/01/2024 - 01/15/2024' from the date range picker
steps.expectedResult: Selected pay period is displayed and highlighted in the date picker

steps.action: Click 'Retrieve Data' button to initiate data retrieval from timekeeping API
steps.expectedResult: Loading spinner appears with message 'Retrieving timekeeping data...' and progress indicator shows

steps.action: Wait for data retrieval process to complete
steps.expectedResult: Success message 'Successfully retrieved 150 time entries' appears in green banner at top of page

steps.action: Review the retrieved data displayed in the timekeeping data grid
steps.expectedResult: Data grid displays all 150 time entries with columns: Employee ID, Employee Name, Date, Hours Worked, Status

postconditions: Timekeeping data is stored in the system database
Data retrieval timestamp is recorded in system logs
Retrieved data is available for validation process
User remains on Timekeeping Data page with data displayed

functional.title: Verify validation of time entries against predefined rules
preconditions: Timekeeping data has been successfully retrieved from API
Validation rules are configured (max 24 hours per day, no negative hours, valid employee IDs)
User is on the 'Timekeeping Data' page with retrieved data displayed
At least 100 time entries are available for validation

steps.action: Click 'Validate Entries' button in the top-right corner of the data grid
steps.expectedResult: Validation process initiates with progress bar showing 'Validating time entries...'

steps.action: Wait for validation process to complete
steps.expectedResult: Validation completes with summary message 'Validation complete: 147 valid entries, 3 discrepancies found'

steps.action: Review the validation summary panel that appears below the data grid
steps.expectedResult: Summary panel displays breakdown: 'Valid Entries: 147', 'Hours Exceeded: 2', 'Invalid Employee ID: 1'

steps.action: Click 'View Discrepancies' link in the summary panel
steps.expectedResult: Data grid filters to show only 3 entries with discrepancies, highlighted in red with error icons

steps.action: Hover over the error icon on the first discrepancy entry
steps.expectedResult: Tooltip appears showing specific validation error: 'Hours worked (26) exceeds maximum allowed (24) for date 01/05/2024'

postconditions: Validation results are saved in the database with timestamp
Discrepancies are flagged for review and resolution
Valid entries are marked as ready for payroll processing
Validation report is generated and available for download

functional.title: Verify user receives notifications for timekeeping discrepancies
preconditions: Validation process has completed and identified discrepancies
User notification settings are enabled for timekeeping alerts
User is logged in as Payroll Specialist
At least 3 discrepancies exist in the validated data

steps.action: Observe the notification bell icon in the top-right corner of the application header
steps.expectedResult: Red badge with number '1' appears on the notification bell icon indicating new notification

steps.action: Click the notification bell icon to open the notifications panel
steps.expectedResult: Notifications panel slides out from right side showing notification: 'Timekeeping Discrepancies Found - 3 entries require review'

steps.action: Click on the notification message in the panel
steps.expectedResult: System navigates to Timekeeping Data page with discrepancies filter automatically applied

steps.action: Check email inbox for notification email
steps.expectedResult: Email received with subject 'Timekeeping Discrepancies Detected - Action Required' containing summary of 3 discrepancies

steps.action: Click 'View Details' link in the email notification
steps.expectedResult: Browser opens to Timekeeping Data page with discrepancies displayed and user authenticated

postconditions: Notification is marked as read in the system
User is aware of discrepancies requiring attention
Notification record is stored in notification history
Email notification is logged in email audit trail

functional.title: Verify user can review and resolve timekeeping discrepancies
preconditions: Discrepancies have been identified and are displayed in the data grid
User is logged in as Payroll Specialist with edit permissions
User is on Timekeeping Data page with discrepancies filter applied
At least one discrepancy entry is visible for resolution

steps.action: Click on the first discrepancy entry row with error 'Hours exceeded: 26 hours on 01/05/2024'
steps.expectedResult: Entry row expands to show detailed view with editable fields and resolution options

steps.action: Review the discrepancy details panel showing original value '26 hours' and validation rule 'Maximum 24 hours per day'
steps.expectedResult: Details panel displays all relevant information including employee name, date, original hours, and error description

steps.action: Select resolution action 'Correct Entry' from the dropdown menu
steps.expectedResult: Hours field becomes editable with current value '26' highlighted

steps.action: Update the hours value to '16' and enter resolution note 'Corrected data entry error - verified with manager'
steps.expectedResult: Updated value is accepted and resolution note field shows character count '52/500'

steps.action: Click 'Save Resolution' button
steps.expectedResult: Success message 'Discrepancy resolved successfully' appears and entry is removed from discrepancies list

steps.action: Verify the discrepancy counter updates in the summary panel
steps.expectedResult: Summary panel now shows 'Valid Entries: 148', 'Discrepancies: 2' with updated counts

postconditions: Resolved entry is updated in the database with corrected value
Resolution note and timestamp are recorded in audit log
Entry is now marked as valid and ready for payroll processing
Discrepancy count is decremented and summary is updated

functional.title: Verify reporting on timekeeping discrepancies with export functionality
preconditions: Validation has been completed with both valid entries and discrepancies
User is logged in as Payroll Specialist
User is on the Timekeeping Data page
At least 5 discrepancies exist in the current pay period

steps.action: Click 'Generate Report' button in the toolbar above the data grid
steps.expectedResult: Report options modal appears with report type selection and format options

steps.action: Select report type 'Discrepancies Report' and format 'PDF' from the dropdown menus
steps.expectedResult: Report configuration options are displayed including date range and filter options

steps.action: Click 'Generate' button to create the discrepancies report
steps.expectedResult: Progress indicator shows 'Generating report...' followed by success message 'Report generated successfully'

steps.action: Click 'Download Report' button that appears after generation
steps.expectedResult: PDF file 'Timekeeping_Discrepancies_Report_20240115.pdf' downloads to default download folder

steps.action: Open the downloaded PDF report
steps.expectedResult: Report displays with header, summary statistics, detailed discrepancy list with all 5 entries, and validation rules applied

postconditions: Report is saved in system reports archive
Report generation is logged in audit trail
Downloaded report is available in user's download folder
User remains on Timekeeping Data page

negative.title: Verify system handles API connection failure during data retrieval
preconditions: User is logged in as Payroll Specialist
Timekeeping integration is configured
User is on Timekeeping Data page
Timekeeping API endpoint is temporarily unavailable or unreachable

steps.action: Select pay period '01/01/2024 - 01/15/2024' from date range picker
steps.expectedResult: Pay period is selected and displayed

steps.action: Click 'Retrieve Data' button to attempt data retrieval from unavailable API
steps.expectedResult: Loading spinner appears with message 'Retrieving timekeeping data...'

steps.action: Wait for connection timeout (approximately 30 seconds)
steps.expectedResult: Error message appears in red banner: 'Failed to retrieve timekeeping data. Unable to connect to timekeeping API. Please check your connection and try again.'

steps.action: Verify that no partial or corrupted data is displayed in the data grid
steps.expectedResult: Data grid remains empty with message 'No data available. Click Retrieve Data to load timekeeping entries.'

steps.action: Check that 'Validate Entries' button remains disabled
steps.expectedResult: 'Validate Entries' button is grayed out and shows tooltip 'No data available for validation' on hover

postconditions: No data is saved to the database from failed retrieval attempt
Error is logged in system error logs with timestamp and error details
User can retry data retrieval after API becomes available
System remains in stable state without data corruption

negative.title: Verify system rejects invalid API credentials during configuration
preconditions: User is logged in as Payroll Specialist
User is on Timekeeping Integration settings page
Integration settings form is displayed and empty
Invalid API credentials are prepared for testing

steps.action: Enter valid API endpoint URL 'https://timekeeping.api.com/v1' in the 'API Endpoint' field
steps.expectedResult: API endpoint URL is accepted and displayed

steps.action: Enter invalid API key 'INVALID_KEY_12345' in the 'API Key' field
steps.expectedResult: API key is masked and displayed as asterisks

steps.action: Click 'Test Connection' button to verify API connectivity with invalid credentials
steps.expectedResult: Error message appears in red banner: 'Authentication failed. Invalid API credentials. Please verify your API key and try again.'

steps.action: Attempt to click 'Save Configuration' button
steps.expectedResult: 'Save Configuration' button remains disabled with tooltip 'Connection test must pass before saving configuration'

steps.action: Verify that no configuration data is persisted
steps.expectedResult: Integration status remains 'Not Configured' and no settings are saved

postconditions: Invalid configuration is not saved to database
Authentication failure is logged in security audit log

System prevents data retrieval with invalid credentials

negative.title: Verify system handles malformed data received from timekeeping API
preconditions: Timekeeping integration is configured and active
User is logged in as Payroll Specialist
Timekeeping API returns malformed JSON data with missing required fields
User is on Timekeeping Data page

steps.action: Select pay period '01/01/2024 - 01/15/2024' and click 'Retrieve Data' button
steps.expectedResult: Data retrieval process initiates with loading spinner

steps.action: Wait for system to process malformed API response
steps.expectedResult: Error message appears: 'Data retrieval completed with errors. Received data does not match expected format. 0 entries imported successfully.'

steps.action: Click 'View Error Details' link in the error message
steps.expectedResult: Error details modal opens showing: 'Parsing errors: Missing required field employee_id in 45 records, Invalid date format in 12 records'

steps.action: Verify data grid remains empty

steps.action: Check that validation cannot proceed
steps.expectedResult: 'Validate Entries' button is disabled and grayed out

postconditions: No malformed data is saved to database
Detailed error information is logged for troubleshooting
User is notified of data format issues

negative.title: Verify unauthorized user cannot access timekeeping integration settings
preconditions: User is logged in with role 'Payroll Clerk' without integration configuration permissions
Timekeeping integration exists and is configured
User is on main payroll dashboard
Role-based access control is enforced

steps.action: Attempt to navigate to 'Timekeeping Integration' settings page by entering URL directly
steps.expectedResult: Access denied page appears with message 'Access Denied. You do not have permission to access timekeeping integration settings.'

steps.action: Verify that integration settings menu option is not visible in navigation
steps.expectedResult: Settings menu does not display 'Timekeeping Integration' option for current user role

steps.action: Attempt to access integration API endpoint directly via browser developer tools
steps.expectedResult: API returns 403 Forbidden status with error message 'Insufficient permissions'

steps.action: Check audit logs for unauthorized access attempt
steps.expectedResult: Security log entry created: 'Unauthorized access attempt to timekeeping integration settings by user [username] at [timestamp]'

postconditions: User remains on access denied page or is redirected to dashboard
No configuration data is exposed to unauthorized user
Security event is logged with user details and timestamp
System security remains intact

negative.title: Verify system handles validation timeout for large datasets
preconditions: Timekeeping data with 10,000+ entries has been retrieved
User is logged in as Payroll Specialist
User is on Timekeeping Data page with large dataset displayed
Validation timeout is set to 5 minutes

steps.action: Click 'Validate Entries' button to initiate validation of 10,000+ entries

steps.expectedResult: After 5 minutes, timeout error appears: 'Validation timeout. Processing is taking longer than expected. Please try validating smaller date ranges.'

steps.action: Verify partial validation results are not saved
steps.expectedResult: No validation status is applied to any entries, all remain in 'Pending Validation' state

steps.action: Check that user can still interact with the interface
steps.expectedResult: Interface remains responsive, user can click 'Cancel' or adjust date range to reduce dataset size

negative.title: Verify system prevents saving resolution without required resolution notes
preconditions: Discrepancies exist and are displayed in data grid

steps.action: Click on discrepancy entry with error 'Hours exceeded: 26 hours'
steps.expectedResult: Entry expands showing resolution options and editable fields

steps.action: Select resolution action 'Correct Entry' and update hours to '16'
steps.expectedResult: Hours field updates to '16' successfully

steps.action: Leave the 'Resolution Note' field empty and click 'Save Resolution' button
steps.expectedResult: Validation error appears below resolution note field: 'Resolution note is required. Please provide details about how this discrepancy was resolved.'

steps.action: Verify that resolution is not saved
steps.expectedResult: Entry remains in discrepancies list with original error status, no changes are persisted

steps.action: Verify resolution note field is highlighted with red border

postconditions: No resolution data is saved without required note

userStoryObject.title: As Payroll Specialist, I want to ensure timekeeping data is accurately integrated to achieve smooth payroll processing
userStoryObject.description:
CONTEXT & BACKGROUND:

The integration of timekeeping data is crucial for payroll accuracy and efficiency.

CURRENT STATE:

Manual input of timekeeping data leads to errors and delays in payroll processing.

DESIRED STATE:

Automated timekeeping integration will ensure timely and accurate payroll processing.

KEY FUNCTIONALITY:

  • Automated data retrieval from timekeeping systems
  • Validation of time entries
  • Error handling mechanisms
  • Reporting on timekeeping discrepancies
  • User notifications for data issues


USER INTERACTION FLOW:

  1. User configures timekeeping integration settings.
  2. System retrieves timekeeping data.
  3. System validates entries for accuracy.
  4. User receives notifications for any discrepancies.
  5. User reviews and resolves discrepancies as needed.


TECHNICAL CONSIDERATIONS:

  • Data source: Timekeeping API endpoints
  • Validation rules: Time entry validation rules
  • API endpoints: Retrieval and validation endpoints for timekeeping data
  • Security: Secure data access protocols
  • Performance: Processing time under
5 minutes.

OUT OF SCOPE:

  • Manual entry of timekeeping data.


SUCCESS METRICS:

  • 98% accuracy in timekeeping data.
  • Payroll processing time reduced by 30%.

Persona: Payroll Specialist (Payroll Specialist)
userStoryObject.acceptanceCriteria:
Criteria 1: System retrieves timekeeping data from the API without errors.

Criteria 2: All time entries are validated against predefined rules.

Criteria 3: Users receive notifications for any discrepancies found during validation.
